meanings: (글·글씨 등을) write, (시·편지 등을) compose, (적다) put[write] (sth) down, (간단히) jot sth down

vlive.korean: 썼어? Are you done? 듣기 View video TWICE : 저녁추천

vlive.korean: [화난 거 아님] 이거 왜 아무도 안 썼어? [Not angry] Why didn't anybody use these? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [DICON] 앙즈뽀짝 폴라로이드 꾸미기③ (IZ*ONE)

vlive.korean: [여기는 구름 때문에 고생] - 아이템 좀! - 누가 구름 썼어! [Having a hard time for clouds] - Item, please! - Who used this? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.107

vlive.korean: 이걸 썼어요? Did you use this? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.11

examples.korean: You’ve spelt my name wrong. 발음듣기 당신이 제 이름을 잘못 썼어요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You’ve spelt my name wrong. 발음

examples.korean: Yes, I wrote the article. What of it? 발음듣기 그래요, 내가 그 글을 썼어요. 그것이 뭐가 어떻단 거예요? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Yes, I wrote the article. What of it? 발음

examples.korean: Well, in round figures we’ve spent twenty thousand so far. 발음듣기 글쎄요, 대략적으로 말해서, 우리가 지금까지 2만쯤 썼어요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Well, in round figures we’ve spent twenty thousand so far. 발음

examples.korean: It was too bitter for my liking. 발음듣기 그건 내가 평소에 좋아하는 것보다 너무 썼어. DARAKWON
examples.english: It was too bitter for my liking. 발음

examples.korean: Spent my entire Saturday trying to get caught up. 발음듣기 토요일 전부를 밀린 거 만회하는데 썼어. DARAKWON
examples.english: Spent my entire Saturday trying to get caught up. 발음
